de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.Word

  • public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents all information about one word in a sentence: id, form, lemma, POS, deprel, head id, children, ...
    Author:
    kesslewd

    • Constructor Detail

      • Word

        public Word(java.lang.String form)
        Create a word with just a word form.
        Parameters:
        form - surface word form.

      • Word

        public Word(int id,
            java.lang.String form,
            java.lang.String lemma,
            java.lang.String POS,
            int headID,
            java.lang.String Deprel)
        Create a word with all info.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the word in the sentence (starting with 1).
        form - Surface word form.
        lemma - Lemma of the word.
        POS - Part-of-speech of the word.
        headID - ID of the head/parent, the word this is dependent of.
        Deprel - Dependency relation btw word and head.

      • Word

        public Word(Word otherWord)
        Creates a word with the exact same informaion as the otherWord.
        Parameters:
        otherWord - A different word.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Word otherWord)
        Compare id and form.
        Parameters:
        otherWord - A different word.
        Returns:
        TRUE if they have the same ID and form, FALSE otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts this Word object one line with only basic information. Form+" ("+id+","+Lemma+","+POS+")";
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        one line.

      • toCoNLLString

        public java.lang.String toCoNLLString()
        Converts this Word to one line following the CoNLL 2009 format. However, it does not include all columns, only dependencies. Information is repeated, no real gold/predicted data.
        Returns:
        one line.
